snippet.title: The Crew Coast to Coast Trailer - E3 2014 [NORTH AMERICA]
snippet.description:
Wonder how long it takes to drive from Miami to Los Angeles in The Crew's version of the United States? Or how many metropolitans and monumental locales you can visit in between? How many activities and friends you can come across along the way? You can find out for yourself on November 11, 2014 when The Crew arrives on the PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC platforms. Until then, enjoy the spacious skies and the mountain majesties in the new Coast-to-Coast gameplay trailer.

NEVER DRIVE ALONE.

Visit the Website: http://thecrew-game.ubi.com/
Join the Crew on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thecrewgame
Follow the Crew on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheCrewGame
